description.lang: HSK-100Z is a portable scene controller with universal IR function. In addition to the zone and scene control. It supports Assocaition/Configuration as well.Controls a wide range of Z-Wave compliant appliances such as switches, dimmers, drape controllers and motorized shades.Supports up to 16 Z-wave GROUP or SCENE.Supports 8 IR controlled A/V equipments with Learning Capability.Easy-to-use XpressZetup for typical users and powerful Advance Setup for experienced users.Best-in-class Association setup capability.Work as Primary or Secondary Controller,perfect companion for Z-Wave gateway.Supports bi-direction and multi-level replication - simplify cloning.Supports multi-channel devices.Supports Z-ExtenderTM.
